sentences.english: A person firmly committed to faith in God does not bow to tempting or compromising situations.
sentences.chinese: 堅定忠信於神的人不向誘人或妥協的景況低頭。

sentences.english: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come.
sentences.chinese: 能力和威儀是她的衣服，她想到日後的景況就喜笑。

sentences.english: How I long for the months gone by, for the days when God watched over me.
sentences.chinese: 惟願我的景況如從前的月份，如神保守我的日子。

sentences.english: God uses the opposite situation of each fruit to allow us a choice.
sentences.chinese: 神以屬靈果子反面的景況來讓我們作出選擇。

sentences.english: Oh that I were as in months past, as in the days when God preserved me;
sentences.chinese: 惟願我的景況如從前的月份，如神保守我的日子。

sentences.english: And that is just on one side of the White Nile.
sentences.chinese: 而這些僅是白尼羅河一岸的景況。

sentences.english: She is a lady in very comfortable circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位景況十分優裕的婦女。

sentences.english: Are you in a position where all self-sufficiency is gone?
sentences.chinese: 你是否處於無法自給自足的景況？

sentences.english: Perhaps you’re in a ‘no win situation’ right now.
sentences.chinese: 也許你正處在一個毫無勝算的景況當中。

sentences.english: Happiness depends on external circumstances, but joy is based on your relationship to God.
sentences.chinese: 快樂憑藉外在的景況，喜樂則源自與神的相交。

sentences.english: And the final condition of that man is worse than the first.
sentences.chinese: 那人末後的景況，比先前更不好了。

definition: to turn a blind eye to
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
the multitudes come out from everywhere, emptying every alleyway (to celebrate)/the whole town turns out
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: could happen at any moment/on the verge
overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long/day and night
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
